definition: A day of the week that typically falls between Friday and Sunday, often associated with the end of the workweek and the beginning of the weekend. It is commonly used to refer to a specific day for various activities, such as leisure, socializing, and relaxation.

examples.english: We are meeting on Saturday evening.
On Saturday morning, I go jogging.

examples.german: Samstag ist der sechste Tag der Woche.
examples.english: Saturday is the sixth day of the week.
